name: Sang Bui
about: This is my personal resume page!!
summary: In 2011, I didn't know OOP, Java, C++, or game development tools. In 2013, I didn't know about JavaScript, Node or its ecosystem; web, iOS, or Android development. In 2015, I didn't know about React/Redux or functional programming. In 2017, I didn't know about Neural Nets or Reinforcement Learning. My biggest asset is not the languages or skills I had the pleasure of learning, but what I could learn.  Learning new programming paradigm, tools, and languages is my best skill.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science

description: Code review for other developers. Defined product requirements and creates high-level architectural specifications, ensuring feasibility and functionality for a full web application. Architect a web application with React/Redux, python backend, Kerbereros Single Sign On Authentication system. Created Base of Estimate on how many hours/cost future project will take. Developed software and follows the company SDLC (Software Development Lifecycle), which includes Agile/Scrum sprint tasking and management using Jira/Gitlab. Worked on a Situational Awareness Web Application.  Help created a Selenium testing suite.
